## My Hometown Resum√© *(short short)*

<br>


I was born in Berlin in the early 1980s when there still was a wall cutting through it:

![separating wall](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

![BWall image](https://i.natgeofe.com/n/3e8d4f1e-1165-4671-9c1c-96ff48e08d73/berlin-wall-reference-548158715.jpg)

<br>

Luckily this wall opened up, nobody got hurt and people got used to party like as if the wall was falling every night.

The following years People came from all over the world and the atmosphere changed to a metropolis what before had been more provincial. 

<br>

## Demographics 

__________

|1980|1990|2000|2010|2020|
|---|:---:|:---:|:---:|---:|
|3,04 Mio|3,43 Mio|3,4 Mio|3,5 Mio| 3,7 Mio|

<br>


The on the first sight slight increase of people is much more when you only take the city centre in the view.
